messages: Someday, someone may experience{~N}these bizarre events. Hopefully,{~N}they will find my notes useful.{~E}
{~D}I don't have the map{~N}for this place.{~E}
{~D}Too dark to look{~N}at the map here.{~E}
There is a {~C2}First aid kit{~C7}.{~N}Take it?{~S4}
The lock is jammed.{~N}This door can't be opened.{~E}
The crack is too small{~N}to reach in.{~E}
Looks like it's been sitting{~N}here for years.
The dust is wiped away{~N}just around the gas tank cap.{~E}
A small glass vial,{~N}wrapped in a plastic bag.
It's like the busted vial{~N}I found in the director's office{~N}at the hospital.{~E}
{~J1(3.3)}Instead of messing with that,{~N}how about coming up with a way{~N}to get out of here?
{~J1(2.6)}You shouldn't be hanging{~N}around here goofing off!
{~J1(3.0)}You want to get yourself killed!?{~N}Get outta here!
{~J1(3.2)}Unless you want to die,{~N}keep your mind on business.
{~J1(3.3)}That guy's gotta be involved{~N}in the local drug racket.
{~J1(3.1)}Man, was he pissed.{~N}And in such a rush, too.
{~J1(3.9)}Anyway, better let him do as he{~N}pleases. There's more than{~N}my life at stake.{~E}
{~J1(3.1)}Man, was he pissed.{~N}And in such a rush, too.{~E}
It's the same date as{~N}the one in the hospital...{~E}

{~L4}{~C3}Investigation stalled.{~N}]PTV] dealers still at large.{~N}{~N}Suspicious deaths continue.{~N}Like the anti-drug mayor,{~N}a narcotics officer dies of{~N}a sudden heart failure of{~N}unknown origin.{~E}
{~C3}Took package.{~N}Told to sit on it awhile.
{~C3}Don't want to get involved,{~N}but can't disobey...
{~C3}He's probably linked to the death{~N}of the mayor and others.{~E}
Batteries, oil cans,{~N}and other items line the shelves.
A fine layer of {~N}dust covers everything,{~N}as if long abandoned.{~E}
There's a radio{~N}on top of the cabinet.
A poster is on the wall.{~N}Don't look at that now, though.{~E}
The power must be out.{~N}It doesn't work.{~E}
There's a guest register.{~N}Nothing special written here.{~E}
There's a vending machine.{~N}It doesn't work.{~E}
Do you want to push{~N}the shelf?{~S4}
